data.title: SUPER SOPHOMORE GAMES: South Carolina Stat Story
data.meta_description: Stat leaderboards for Team South Carolina positional players from the workout day at the 2024 Prep Baseball East Super Sophomore Games.
data.text:
The East Coast Super Sophomore Games is the premier summer scouting event for Class of 2027 prospects.

Each state's team will play 2 pool play games followed by sinlgle elimination bracket play to determine a champion. On Friday, the first day of the event, all position players will be put through a showcase workout in which they will run 60s, take batting practice and be evaluated defensively at their primary position.

Players participating in the Super Sophomore Games will receive the PBR Tech Package which includes TrackMan hitting and pitching metrics, Blast Motion swing metrics and running times.

Below we take a first look at some some numbers from the workout day!

+ Click here to view all rosters and captured statistics from the Workout Day.
